item.description:
Join us for a fun and relaxing brunch at Joe's American Bar and Grill. This restaurant has a great brunch menu with reasonable prices (you can check their website for the complete menu). Enjoy meeting new and friendly people, catching up with friends and having a relaxing Sunday brunch. Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink.

If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside ent. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.why: Join us for a fun and relaxing brunch at Joe's American Bar and Grill. This restaurant has a great brunch menu with reasonable prices
item.name: Sunday Brunch at Joe's American Bar and Grill, Framingham
